plot: A young woman recalls repainting the apartment where she and her abusive former partner used to live. Shaken and disoriented by flashbacks, she is unsure of where to draw the line between present experience and past memory.
title: This Bleeding Place
plot_es: A young woman recalls repainting the apartment where she and her abusive former partner used to live. Shaken and disoriented by flashbacks, she is unsure of where to draw the line between present experience and past memory.
